title: Outcome-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for Improving Health Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and fundamental concepts in health sciences
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing enhanced efficiency of language education in health sciences and increased learner engagement in mobile learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can communicate using specialized terminology in health sciences with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform self-directed learning activities at least once daily through microlearning content provided in mobile environments.
Learners will achieve 90% or higher in learning outcomes by the end of the educational course through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
